ABSmodJ
Class ExtTrigActivity

java.lang.Object
  ABSmodJ.Behaviour
      ABSmodJ.ActivitySuper
          ABSmodJ.ExtTrigActivity
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExtActivity
public abstract class ExtTrigActivity
extends ActivitySuper

Extend this class to implement extended triggered activity constructs. Note that there is no precondition() method for such classes.

Author:
Gilbert Arbez

ExtTrigActivity

public ExtTrigActivity()
Method Detail

preEmption

public abstract void preEmption()
Implements the extended activity pre-emption SCS.

interruptionPreCond

public abstract int interruptionPreCond()
Implements the extended activity interruption preconditions. Note that if multiple preconditions are specified for the construct, they are all added to the method which returns a numerical identifier of the first precondition found to be true.

Returns:
A number 1, 2, ... to identify which precondition is true, and 0 if all preconditions are false.

interruptionSCS

public abstract void interruptionSCS(int interruptID)
Implements all interruption SCS's. The interruptID parameters indicates which precondition was found to be true and hence which SCS needs to be executed. (Called by the runSimulation() method).

Parameters:
interruptID -
